channel.title: How do I use Eclipse IDE to run a source, compile etc?
channel.description: Title says it all, if someone would be willing to help me then that would be very appreciated, I am not even sure if I have the right IDE of Eclipse to run java script... I know I may sound like a retard but if someone would help me step by step on how to use an IDE it would be veeerrryyyy appreciated... Thanks

item.title: How do I use Eclipse IDE to run a source, compile etc?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

First of all JavaScript is it’s own language; I’m assuming you mean Java class files, also, the version of Eclipse you will need is pretty simple. Eclipse IDE for Java Developers. Setting it up? That should also be extremely easy once you’ve gotten the feel for the UI and such. What are you having issues with specifically?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I use Eclipse IDE to run a source, compile etc?
